name: stealth-rock
effect: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
short_effect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user launches countless stones at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
